186040027.review: Ótimo souls, fugiu da temática medieval para inovar com um cenário futurista. A mecânica de remover partes dos inimigos para implantar em si mesmo foi uma ideia magnifica!

185921075.review:
What to say apart from  that, I had a great time with the Surge ! 

It's an ingenious new way of implanting gameplay into a souls like, and I love it, the feel and ambiance are amazing too, and you can't find that elsewhere on any other license honestly. Half high-tech mecha vibe with gory and sometime horrory vibe, I've got to say it's a well though of cocktail.

Nothing much to say about the bosses, although I like the fact that you have multiple ways of obtaining boss weapons by killing them in different manners. 

To me, this is what a souls like should look like, and I really enjoyed my time with it.

Can't wait to start The Surge 2 !

Let's see what Creo left us to deal with !

185837090.review:
The Metacritic and Steam recommendation ratio is pretty on-point.

It is a charming, different looking, innovating but a bit underccoked, repetitive, confusing and with a touch of jank game. Not a masterpiece of a Souls-like, but certainly an interesting one.

185709478.review: First of all, it's no Dark Souls. But it's also no original Lords of the Fallen. Creators learned a lot on that one and rather than making another souls clone, they made their own thing. If you open enough, try it, you my find it to your taste. If you're looking for Dark Souls 4 or Elden Ring 2, this is not the place.

185611549.review:
Заметил у игры смешанные отзывы за последнее время. Решил поинтересоваться что за напасть такая людей в игре мучает, что они весьма хорошему проекту ставят негативные оценки. Вижу что-то в последних отзывах люди необоснованно "левел дизайнеров"  проклинают,  долго думал за что их можно проклинать, так и не придумал  ;-)))) . Капнул глубже, посмотрел отзывы за все время (думал там найду конструктив) , и тут мне все стало понятно. Игра сама по себе не сложная, я бы даже сказал легкая (сравнивать с DS не могу ибо не играл, ну по крайней мере на момент написания отзыва) , но люди описывают игру как нечто поистине сложное просто непроходимое, и посвящают этому просто тома текста. И даже тонны коментов из серии это у тебя руки крюки и мозг не варит (с точными указаниями в каком месте крюки и в каком не варит) не помогают авторам осмыслить свое положение как геймера в тэтрис а не "соус лайк" продукты.
 Кароче, берите всем советую. [Только если вы не игрок в тэтрис, а то игра может показаться сложной]

185587012.review: 莫名其妙的升级系统，莫名其妙的地图设计，莫名其妙的敌怪数值，莫名其妙的BOSS机制，莫名其妙的伤害判定，莫名其妙的打击感，看得出制作组有点想法，但实际游玩体验只能用灾难来形容

185520844.review: A solid entry in the souls-like genre. Combat is fun. Level design can feel a bit repetitive at times, though they try to do the same shortcuts that make souls games fun. Still, there's some levels that I just get sick of because it looks like everything else. Other than the level design, however, the game has a distinct vibe to the enemies/tech/facility which stands out from the mostly fantasy focused souls games I've played in the past. I like how hard the weapons hit, they really seem to have some weight. I like the development system for your weapons/levels too. The asking price for the game is reasonable, especially when its on deal. For sub 5 USD, I'd buy it in a heartbeat.

185502227.review: 1代讲了一个结构紧凑的赛博末世故事，而且立意不低。相比2代的喧闹过家家，1代的整体氛围更加冷峻孤独，更有魂味。

185497095.review:
个人认为非常优秀的机甲类魂，个人评价很高。

看了看其他人的评价，部分我是认同的，比如地形复杂，缺少辨识度，后面还要返回之前的地图再到某个位置坐火车再去其他地图，总体来看略有一点开放地图的影子，总体是非线性，BOSS不多，难度上个人认为是刚刚好，恰好在我练一练能打过的程度，略高于舒适区，挑战性恰好，不过这一点还是因人而异。装备和芯片共享容量只能说还好吧，个人还是比较喜欢这个设计的，搭配起来自由度比较高，不会出现升级某一个方向不容易换其他玩法的情况（不过一代比较薄弱，实际上也没太多流派选择就是了），虽然重甲消耗容量比较高，类比到魂，也不是一开始轻易满配重甲不是吗。个人认为比较大的缺点在于武器熟练度这个东西，这才是真正影响玩法选择的一点，比如打完最终BOSS，二周目想玩个双爪，但是一周目只练了单手剑，双爪的伤害加成就非常低，同样用这个系统我想吐槽的是无主之地1，除去这个比较影响体验的一点，其他设计最多微瑕，总体来说是瑕不掩瑜的一部作品，个人认为值得一玩。

185461624.review: Game is amazing buy it play it .

185365247.review: Первый раз попробовал, игру из разряда dark souls. И не успели меня выкинуть, на свалку, так первый же моб поимел меня в жопу, и так на притяжение всей игры, eбyт в жопу с каждого угла, пока не нафармишь себе мани, чтобы качнуть лвл, и дать им реванш, т.к яйца уже подросли. Впечатление, в целом неплохие, когда размер очка уже с дом, но ты трахаешь последнего обоссаного босса и видишь титры. Сюжет базовый, на пол игры уже забил на него. Из минусов это xyeвая игровая карты, т.к её в принципе нет, она есть только на "теликах", но толку от этого мало. Есть некоторые локации где можно потеряться, потому что - это eбyчий лабиринт из вентиляционных объедков.

185351133.review:
Its truly a good game, not just another imprefect soulslike, its way underrated
Not a perfect game, but I generally enjoyed the jank and slow combat of Dark Souls 2, so if you did as well, and if you like cyberpunk dystopian stuff, you might really enjoy this
The only other issue is its sometimes very labyrinthian and it gets very hard to know where to go, its the interconnectibility of the world taken to an extreme
Not v long, and not overly hard for a soulslike, fun game, and the atmosphere is perfectly dark and heavy, could give this an A- or a solid 8/10, but know what you're getting into - its a soulslike with slow and tactical combat
People seem to have no problem when some fights fromsoft soulslikes from the same gen are as jank as it gets, but when another souslike is a bit janky theyre mad
I also enjoy the lower number of bosses, leaves more "space" for exploring and enjoying the atmosphere, parts of soulslikes I enjoy way more
EDIT: forgot to mention, the thing I dislike the most, is that all "bonfires"/upgrade/safe spots have the same song playing, and I think its about a minute or two long, its not bad at all, fits it perfectly, but after playing for some time I got SOOO SICK of it playing over and over, again the artist did a good job but it gets overplayed, again this is a v minor drawback really

185318237.review: Really tried liking this game but I instantly go flashbacks to Dark Souls 2. I pushed through that game because the story and gameplay was interesting, but this game just does not have any of that going. Gameplay is clunky and when you dodge you feel like a fridge moving quickly side to side. Combat is not very engaging and the design for weapons is uninspiring . Imagine charging at enemies with a pipe or the glorified jack hammer that the first set enemies have.  I really wish that at least they got the gameplay right. I didn't like the story to Nioh but combat was fun and there were plenty of builds that you can experiment. I watched a video where I discovered that there is a michelin man armor set. Like bruh, really? Please do yourself a favor and avoid this game. It depressed the hell out of me!

184871100.review: Combat was fun. Bosses and level design were not,

184855788.review:
There are some real innovations to the genre in this game, and many parts of the game are well executed, but the shortcomings undermine the successes. The weak-point targeting system is great; it causes you to make a split second decision between acquiring new gear or beating the enemy faster to conserve health. The ability to bank your credits is also a welcome addition. The bosses fights are enjoyable enough. This game is ruined by a repetitive game play loop, too much backtracking, and aimless wandering as you try to find where to go next, which is exacerbated by the sameness of every room and hallway in each area.

There are better souls-likes out there, go try Code Vein.

184799853.review: The Surge is a souls-like with very bad, unresponsive feeling combat. It's not particularly difficult but the maze-like level design, frequent backtracking and obnoxiously long boss battles make it tedious to get through.

184739136.review: 二周目最终boss打的我满头大汗，还上了两个动觉放大器v.5补伤害，我靠，boss二阶段我压根不敢近身，只敢打打回合制加滑铲，毕竟boss打我两下我人就没了，穿重甲都打成这个样子，五周目就算了，反正也全成就了

184708403.review:
I've beaten this game so many times that I actually got to New Game +10. Its pretty good if I'm being honest. Even though its the same thing over and over the style of the game is just so cool. It's a shame that this game is so underrated. If this game came released a couple years after 2017 (maybe 2019-2020) it would of been a big hit, but that's just what I think.
If you like the Dark Souls games then you'll like this. The Surge is Dark Souls but in the future. You play a character by the name of Warren, I man that cannot use his legs. After watching a video on Creo, a company working to repair the world, Warren applies for a job at Creo. When arriving to one of the many train stations in and around the Creo Facility, Warren proceeds to job registration. Here he is allowed to choose what kind of job he will have. For some odd reason there are only two options to pick from, the Rhino Class (big lifting job) and the Lynx Class (field operator). You can choose either one of them. After selecting a class he is put into a medical chair to have the Exo-Skeleton installed. Every thing seems to be going smooth when all of the sudden, the system doesn't sedate him. While wide awake the surgical machines are drilling bolts and screws into his body. After all of the limbs have been installed with the Exo-Skeleton a Neural Link must be installed in the brain. This allows him to use the parts of the Exo-Skeleton attached to his limbs. The only problem is, the Neural Link is drilled into his head while he is awake. ... This is the first review I have ever written. I'm sure if I did a good job or not but I hope you enjoy the game if you decide to play it. Thank you for reading this!

it could be a little less maze like at times.

184119999.review: Игра пройдена на 100%, а значит пора написать обзор по этой неплохой соулс лайк игре. В общем и целом мне понравилось, первое прохождение было в удовольствие. Залезал в каждый уголок и все исследовал. Игра не такая уж и запутанная, если у вас нет тупографического кретенизма, то проблем составить не должно, локации примерно так же запутаны как и в других соулс лайках. Игра не сложная, всех боссов побеждал максимум с 3х попыток, главное понять чего да как вообще в этой игре работает. Достижения не сложные, но пропускаемые. Оружия не то чтобы сильно все отличаются друг от друга, в основном статами, а по мувсету их всего 5 получается. Брони тоже только 3 вида, легка, средняя и тяжелая, но очень красивая и стильная, выбор зависит только от вкуса и предпочтений кому что нравится и кому какие нравятся бонусы от комлпектов для комфортной игры.  Длс скучные, одно коротенькое и быстро проходимо, ничего сюжетного важного не содержит толком, а второе так вообще испытания, которые прошлись очень легко и быстро, даже модификаторы никак не усложнили их. 6\10 за всю игру.

183973583.review: When you fully exit game it ends up being a blank screen and it will stay that way till you manually get it back to your steam

183966211.review:
[h3] Not your average day at work [/h3]

I found the story and lore interesting, I'd say it is closer to hard-sf than sci-fi and there is a touch of horror to it too. As you've probably already read on the store page an other reviews, the game takes place in a high-tech megacorporation named CREO which is supposedly trying to " save the world " by providing different kinds of solutions. From improving the climate by " restoring the earth's natural shield " to helping people with disabilities and even entertainment devices. The protagonist - Warren - decides to use the chance and join the company so he can finally walk again. The idea of letting the player control the character before and after his surgery was cool, you can really feel the difference of the movement speed and agility ( well not in real life but in-game at least ).

There is that constant feel of " wtf is going on here? " which I like and kinda gives the game a horror vibe and it kept me wanting to progress further. The ending is kinda cliffhanger though.

[h3] Gameplay [/h3]

My favorite part here is the animations and how enemies act differently depending on the distance you have between them and which side you attack from. It's definitely convincing and feels like the npc's are an entity on their own. I also like the camera work, especially during boss fights the game has a cinematic feel. The kill cam mutilations are brutal, I think the devs got a bit too creative there and I like it. The idea of how you harvest upgrade parts is also original, where you basically cut the limb carrying the armor part you want to collect it. At first I actually saw the augmentation parts as character customization which is kinda funny, I tried to combine different parts to create my dream cyborg. You may lose a few bonuses doing that but it honestly isn't that bad once you figure out the basic gameplay mechanics. 


[h3] Other [/h3]

The visuals hold up, it may not have 4K textures but the overall design is top notch. They nailed the theme of being in a high-tech industrial area, the amount of little details is insane as every device and machine are connected with something to make it look convincing. The lack of minimap and objective marker made the game more immersive for me, a big facility would be confusing to navigate in real life too if you were new there and I think this is how they wanted it to feel like. Plus this game is made in such a way that can be played infinitely (I think there is no limit to NG+, I am currently at NG+4 ), so you will learn the areas by playing. At first I was kinda pissed that a cyborg doesn't have an interactive map but lore wise it would make sense, because if your GPS was enabled you would be detected by the enemies.
